page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: The employment survey took place in two different places:- Ickenham and Denham. ICKENHAM: We found that in Ickenham more people tended to be in professional jobs i.e.:- teachers, doctors and businessmen. They tended to be higher earners than in Denham, and in Ickenham not many women worked. We also found that in Ickenham more people commuted to London than in Denham. DENHAM: We found that more people in were employed as drivers or builders etc... and far more women worked. Also in Denham there were far more people unemployed.{ { By:-Kathy Meredith, Laura Farrant, { Claire Molyneaux, David May, { Simon Beale & Stuart Hemmings. { }
